name: dmd-readable
description: A plugin for dmd and jsdoc-to-markdown to provide more readable docs

scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run docs && git add --all && git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "Updating docs"
scripts.update-clean: npm run pre-clean && npm run update
scripts.update-commit: npm run update && npm test && git add --all && git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "Updating dependencies"
scripts.update-patch: npm run update-commit && npm version patch
